item.title: How to use editor
item.description: Shortcuts Keyboard Command Description Command + s Save file Command + c Copy Command + v Paste Control + Tab Change file Command + w Close file Command + n Open new file There are tons of keybindings on Editor which derives from Ace Editor. It can be set up but may not work some of them as iOS has already uses the keys.
